entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
